title: Ep 11: Choose Your Own Rickventure
description:
A SPECIAL EPISODE: This week we let Erika decide between two choices.  The other is lost in the Reddit ether forever!  We also read a Yahoo! news article written by the King of Beer himself.
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod
Music by: James Young
https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg
